title: HD - Cycling the Highlands of Scotland
content: One week of cycling in wonderful Scotland. Roughly from Edinburgh to Fort William, Dornie, Loch Ness, Inverness, Perth and back to Edinburgh. You can see Ben Nevis with a clear sky and of course a few midges. Enjoy. Look at our routemap and some pictures at toko-op-fietsvakantie.nl/2009-fietsen-in-schotland.php (And the first scene you see is from the movie Highlander by Russell Mulcahy).    Show more
